author: chirino
msg: no need to configure the maxInactivityDuration since it is controlled using a WireFormatInfo.

author: fhanik
msg: The DeltaSession now implements ReplicatedMapEntry, so it can be used in the LazyReplicatedMap scenario

author: fhanik
msg: added in proper locking to the ReplicatedMapEntry

author: chirino
msg: The maxInactivityDuration is now negociated using the WireFormatInfo.  This makes it easier to configure connections since client and server configs do not HAVE to match up excactly.
